title: The Healing Algorithm
outcome: Halden’s secret empathy code activates, suspending punitive BCI actions for two weeks as mass solidarity sweeps Stenograd. The Council is forced into the open, debating the system’s future while citizens demand the algorithm remains kind. The truth behind Halden’s gentler intentions leaks, challenging the regime’s justification for control and shifting the political balance toward community-driven governance.

events.description: A sudden citywide shift in BCI behavior grants equal rights and services to all residents. Surprised citizens experience unexpected relief: access is restored, arbitrary restrictions lifted, and quotas paused.
Public celebrations break out in affected neighborhoods. Vigils turn to street festivals, as even historically low-score citizens join in civic life. The Council faces mounting pressure for answers.
Council analysts discover Halden embedded an "empathy failsafe" that triggers BCI-wide fairness under mass distress. He intended for the system’s harshness to be countered by collective unity.

Major newspapers and Rada’s reporting confirm the existence of Halden’s empathy code. Citywide debate erupts: should the BCI keep prioritizing compassion, or should the system return to strict control?
A landmark vote is organized with broad participation. Citizens overwhelmingly opt to permanently embed the empathy protocol, confirming a decisive shift toward people-driven governance.
